article: store locationssirin labs is excited to announce that after receiving your input and combining it with market research on emerging crypto markets , we have decided to open our first group of stores in the following locations : new york , seoul , tokyo , berlin , and tel aviv . you 'll be able to purchase sirin labs products in all of these locations , in addition to our existing store in mayfair , london . our stores will have a unique concept , we will share more information about this in the near future . we 're looking forward to engaging with you in these communities on blockchain and cryptocurrency !

bancor partnershipstarting tomorrow , you will be able to acquire the srn tokens on the bancor platform . this is part of our continued efforts to make it easier for those who want to pre-order the finney to do so . the bancor protocol will also come pre-installed on every finney device to enable users to easily convert between various tokens , including eth , bnt , and srn . marketplace updatewe 're in advanced process with the leading marketplaces on having the srn token available . stay tuned for exciting news .
